statements: SELECT player_name, player_level FROM Player WHERE player_score > 1000 ORDER BY player_level DESC, last_login ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM Player WHERE guild_id = 5 ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_score FROM Player WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01'
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_score FROM Player WHERE player_score >= 500 ORDER BY player_score DESC, player_name ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT player_level, COUNT(*) FROM Player GROUP BY player_level HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
SELECT * FROM Player WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM Player WHERE player_score > 100 ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, guild_id FROM Player WHERE player_level BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY last_login ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_score FROM Player WHERE guild_id = 3 AND creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level FROM Player WHERE player_name LIKE 'Alice%' AND player_score < 50 ORDER BY player_level DESC, player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, username FROM players WHERE level > 10;
SELECT username, last_login FROM players ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT player_id, experience FROM players WHERE experience BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM friendships WHERE status='accepted';
SELECT * FROM players WHERE level > 50 ORDER BY experience DESC;
SELECT username, level FROM players WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, username, level, experience FROM players JOIN friendships ON players.player_id = friendships.player1_id WHERE friendships.status = 'active';
SELECT player_id, username, level FROM players WHERE level >= 30 AND experience < 1000 ORDER BY level ASC, experience DESC;
SELECT player_id, level, last_login FROM players WHERE last_login BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-08-01' ORDER BY last_login DESC, level DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, username, level FROM players WHERE level > 10;
SELECT player_id, username, level FROM players ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT * FROM friends WHERE player_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i10j11k12l';
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time, player_id FROM game_sessions WHERE end_time IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE level > 5;
SELECT username, level FROM players WHERE experience > 1000 ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT player_id, username, level, experience FROM players WHERE level < 3 AND experience > 500;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_friends FROM friends GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT players.username, game_sessions.start_time, game_sessions.end_time FROM players JOIN game_sessions ON players.player_id = game_sessions.player_id;
SELECT * FROM Players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM Players ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT MAX(player_score) AS max_score FROM Players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM Players WHERE player_score < 1000;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM Players WHERE player_level BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM Players WHERE player_level > 10 ORDER BY player_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Players WHERE player_score BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY player_level ASC;
SELECT player_name, item_name FROM Players JOIN Items ON Players.player_id = Items.item_id WHERE item_type = 'weapon';
SELECT Players.player_name, Friends.friend_id FROM Players JOIN Friends ON Players.player_id = Friends.player_id WHERE Players.player_level > 5 AND Friends.friend_id = 3;

SELECT player_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM Players JOIN Interactions ON Players.player_id = Interactions.player_id WHERE interaction_type = 'message' AND interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, friend_id FROM friends WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_type FROM items;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_level > 5 ORDER BY player_score DESC
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_score BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000
SELECT MAX(player_score) AS highest_score FROM players
SELECT player_name, item_name FROM players JOIN player_items ON players.player_id = player_items.player_id JOIN items ON items.item_id = player_items.item_id
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1 OR receiver_id = 1 ORDER BY message_id DESC
